      • getMountHandler

        public TCMountPacketHandler getMountHandler()
        Gets the packet handler responsible for sending entity mount packets at the right time. The handler makes sure the vehicle and passengers are spawned before issueing the mount packet.
        Returns:
        mount handler

        public com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.inventory.ItemParser[] getParsers(java.lang.String key,
                                                                        int amount)
        Obtains all Item parsers associated with a certain key and amount. If none was found in the TrainCarts item mapping, it is parsed.
        Parameters:
        key - to get
        amount - to multiply the result with. Use 1 to ignore.
        Returns:
        An array of associated item parsers
